testcase.name: User signs in to an existing Trello account
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user is on the Trello sign-in page✅ When the user enters their email and clicks the 'Continue' button✅ Then the user should see the password field✅ When the user enters their password and clicks the 'Log in' button✅ Then the user should be redirected to their Trello boards page

testcase.name: Create a new board
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user is on the Trello dashboard✅ When the user clicks on the 'Create' button✅ Then the user should see a create board options list ✅ When the user clicks on the 'Create board' button✅ Then the user should see create board menu ✅ When the user enters a title for the board and clicks 'Create' button✅ Then the new board should be created and navigated to it

testcase.name: Create a list on a board
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user is viewing a specific Trello board✅ When the user clicks on the '+ Add List' button✅ Then the user should see list name field✅ When the user enters a list name and clicks on the 'Add list' button✅ Then the new list should appear on the board

testcase.name: Create a card on a list
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user has a list on a Trello board✅ When the user clicks on the '+ Add a card' button✅ Then the user should see a new card field✅ When the user enters a card name and clicks on the 'Add a card' button✅ Then the new card should be added to the list

testcase.name: Search for a board
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user is on the Trello homepage✅ When the user clicks on the search bar✅ Then the user should see a search popup ✅ When the user entered the board name✅ Then the relevant board should appear in the search results

testcase.name: Edit user profile information
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user on the Trello boards page✅ When the user click on account icon✅ Then the user should see a account menu ✅ When the user click on Profile and visibility button✅ Then the user navigates to the profile settings✅ When the user update their profile information and click save button✅ Then the changes should be saved successfully, and the user will see an alert

testcase.name: Edit workspace details
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given the user on Trello boards page✅ When the user press settings button✅ Then the user navigates to the Trello workspace settings page✅ When the user press pencil icon✅ Then the user should see a organization detail form ✅ When the user enters a new workspace name and click save button✅ Then the workspace title should be updated
